BREAST-COMPOSITION: The breast tissue in this image appears to be heterogeneous, exhibiting both dense glandular and fatty tissues.
FINDINGS: There is a round, well-circumscribed opacity with regular margins, measuring approximately 10mm in diameter. This finding suggests a benign lesion such as a fibroadenoma or a fat necrosis.
